fullplot: A band of courageous men sets out to find and recover a family of settlers that has mysteriously vanished from their home. Expecting the offenders to be a band of fierce natives, the group prepares for a routine battle. But they soon discover that the real enemy stalks them from below.
plot: In the Wild West a rescue party sets out to find a family of settlers that has vanished from their home under mysterious circumstances.
title: The Burrowers
